name: preact-server
description: Render JSX to an HTML string, with support for Preact components.

scripts.bench:v8: BABEL_ENV=test microbundle benchmarks/index.js -f modern --alias benchmarkjs-pretty=benchmarks/lib/benchmark-lite.js --external none --target node --no-compress --no-sourcemap --raw -o benchmarks/.v8.js && v8 --module benchmarks/.v8.modern.js
scripts.build: npm run -s transpile && npm run -s transpile:jsx && npm run -s copy-typescript-definition
scripts.transpile:jsx: microbundle src/jsx.js -o dist/jsx.js --target web --external preact && microbundle dist/jsx.js -o dist/jsx.js -f cjs --external preact
scripts.test: eslint src test && tsc && npm run test:mocha && npm run bench
scripts.test:mocha: BABEL_ENV=test mocha -r @babel/register -r test/setup.js test/**/[!compat]*.test.js && npm run test:mocha:compat
